snippet: Despite the influence of “Soul Train” on pop-culture memory, friends and supporters lament what little serious recognition and respect Don Cornelius got when he was alive.
abstract: Profile of Don Cornelius, creator, owner, producer and host of television program Soul Train who recently committed suicide; Cornelius's friends and supports lament how little serious recognition and respect came his way when he was alive.
lead_paragraph: Despite the influence of “Soul Train” on pop-culture memory, friends and supporters lament what little serious recognition and respect Don Cornelius got when he was alive.

headline.seo: Don Cornelius, Host of ‘Soul Train,’ and His Muted Legacy
headline.main: When the Music Stopped for Don Cornelius
